alert.note: Alert for Jemez Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 1:45AM MST until January 18 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations between 1 and 4 inches. Highest amounts expected on west facing slopes. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Jemez Mountains. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Tire traction will be reduced. Extend the distance between your vehicle and the vehicle in front of you. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of blowing snow may reduce visibility below 1 mile at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.
